channel.title: Afk
channel.description: Hey im trying to add like ::afk or ::sit etc and i wanrt to know if anyone has the code or knows how to add it to my vistex soucer

item.title: Afk
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:10, topic:456218”]Conventions people jesus…


		boolean sit = false;

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("afk") && sit == false) {
			if (c.inWild())
				return;
			sit = true;
			switch (c.playerRights) {
			case 1:
				c.startAnimation(4117);
				c.forcedText = "I need peace, I'm away from keyboard!";
				c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
				c.updateRequired = true;
				c.sendMessage("When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.");
				break;
			case 2:
			case 3:
				c.startAnimation(4117);
				c.forcedText = "I need peace, I'm away from keyboard!";
				c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
				c.updateRequired = true;
				c.sendMessage("When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.");
				break;
			case 0:
				c.startAnimation(4117);
				c.forcedText = "I need peace, I'm away from keyboard!";
				c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
				c.updateRequired = true;
				c.sendMessage("When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.");
				break;
			case 4:
				c.startAnimation(4117);
				c.forcedText = "I need peace, I'm away from keyboard!";
				c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
				c.updateRequired = true;
				c.sendMessage("When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.");
				break;
			}

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("back") && sit == true) {
				if (c.inWild())
					return;
				sit = false;
				c.startAnimation(12575);
				c.forcedText = "I'm back to play everyone!";
				c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
				c.updateRequired = true;
			}
		}

You’re probably going to have to instance that boolean in the player class.[/quote]Lol i wrote it in the box, but I changed it to make you happy.

Read full topic

item.title: Afk
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

^ that but cleaner.

[code=java]boolean sit;

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“afk”) && sit == false)) {
if(c.inWild())
return;
sit = true;
switch (c.playerRights) {
case 1:
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “I need peace, I’m away from keyboard!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.”);
break;
case 2:
case 3:
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “I need peace, I’m away from keyboard!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.”);
break;
case 0:
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “I need peace, I’m away from keyboard!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.”);
break;
case 4:
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “I need peace, I’m away from keyboard!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.”);
break;
}
}

                    if (playerCommand.startsWith("back") && sit == true) {
                    if(c.inWild())
                    return;
                    sit = false;
            	c.startAnimation(12575); 
                    c.forcedText = "I'm back to play everyone!";
                    c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
                    c.updateRequired = true;
                    }
	}[/code]

Should work…

item.title: Afk
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

Here ya go…

[code=java]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“afk”) && c.sit == false) {
if(c.inWild()) {
c.sendMessage(“You cannot go away from keyboard in the Wilderness…”);
return;
}
c.sit = true;
if(c.playerRights == 1) {
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “I need peace, I’m away from keyboard!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.”);
}
if(c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) {
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “I need peace, I’m away from keyboard!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.”);
}
if(c.playerRights == 0) {
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “I need peace, I’m away from keyboard!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.”);
}
if(c.playerRights == 4) {
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “I need peace, I’m away from keyboard!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“When you return type ::back, you cannot move while AFK is on.”);
}
}

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("back") && c.sit == true) {
		if(c.inWild()) {
		c.sendMessage("It's not the best idea to do this in the Wilderness...");
		return;
		}
		c.sit = false;
	c.startAnimation(12575); 
		c.forcedText = "I'm back to play everyone!";
		c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
		c.updateRequired = true;
		}[/code]

Read full topic
